example.text: EPA’s new proposed rules would kill jobs in Wyoming and raise energy costs for families across the country. We can protect the environment and unleash clean, affordable, and reliable American energy at the same time. [[url]]

[[user]] voted to advance two of my bipartisan bills today. The Nuclear Fuel Security Act will rebuild America’s nuclear fuel supply chain. America’s Outdoor Recreation Act will increase access to the outdoors & boost our outdoor recreation economy. [[url]]

Reintroduced legislation to repeal the largest tax hike from the Democrats’ reckless tax and spending bill. Taxes like the book minimum tax undermine our supply chain, threaten our energy security, and send jobs and investment overseas. [[url]]
These include Chinese companies using slave labor. This tells you ESG is a scam by the radical left.

Last year, #SCOTUS rightfully confirmed Congress, not the EPA, has the authority to create environmental policy. Nothing has changed since then to give the unelected and unaccountable bureaucrats at the EPA this authority.
Well, to strengthen his ties with Vladimir Putin. The list goes on and on of failures and crises that this administration is facing and, for the most part, has caused and created.
